directions: Cut tofu into bite sized pieces and place it in a deep baking dish; add pineapple.  Pour in teriyaki sauce.  Refrigerate for at least 1 hour.
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Bake in preheated oven for 20 minutes, or until hot and bubbly.
title: Teriyaki Tofu with Pineapple
